## One-Hot Encoding Demo

```{r}
# Create Example Data
df <- data.frame(
  id = 1:5,
  color = c("red", "blue", "green", "red", "blue")
)

head(df)

# One-Hot Encoding with Base R
one_hot <- model.matrix(~ color - 1, data = df)

one_hot
```

```{r}

# One-Hot Encoding with fastDummies
if (!require("fastDummies")) install.packages("fastDummies")
library(fastDummies)
df_onehot <- dummy_cols(df, select_columns = "color")

df_onehot

```
